item.title: Buzz : Game Changer trailer will be released on this date - 123telugu
item.description:
Buzz: Game Changer trailer will be released on this date

Published on: Dec 29, 2024 10:00 am IST

Game Changer, the much-anticipated film directed by Shankar and featuring Ram Charan, is set to release its trailer on January 4, 2025.

  • The film will be released worldwide on January 10, 2025, in major Indian languages.
  • Fans are eagerly awaiting the trailer, which has not yet been officially announced.
  • The film stars Kiara Advani, Anjali, and other notable actors in significant roles.
  • Produced by Dil Raju and featuring music by Thaman, it promises a grand cinematic experience.
‚ÄúKeeping fans on the edge of their seats.‚Äù

The buildup to the trailer's release is generating considerable excitement among fans, marking Game Changer as a focal point in upcoming Indian cinema.

item.title: Why did Suriya leave Vanangaan? Bala explains - 123telugu
item.description:
Why did Suriya leave Vanangaan? Bala explains

Published on Dec 29, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

In a recent interview, filmmaker Bala clarified why Suriya exited the upcoming Tamil action drama Vanangaan, which is set to release on January 10, 2025.

  • The film was initially set with Suriya in the lead role, and some scenes were already filmed.
  • Logistical challenges arose from filming in real locations and tourist spots, leading to a mutual decision for Suriya to leave.
  • Bala assured that both he and Suriya remain on good terms and plan to collaborate in the future.
  • This clarification dispels rumors of creative differences being the cause of Suriya's departure.
  • Vanangaan stars Arun Vijay and is co-produced by Bala.
‚ÄúThere were no personal differences between us, and we remain on good terms,‚Äù said Bala.

This clarification helps fans understand the circumstances behind Suriya's exit from Vanangaan and reaffirm the positive working relationship between him and Bala.

item.title: Will this speculation about Pushpa 2 come true? - 123telugu
item.description:
Will this speculation about Pushpa 2 come true?

Published on Dec 29, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

Pushpa 2, directed by Sukumar and featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has grossed an impressive Rs. 1720 crore and continues to perform well at the box office even in its fourth week.

  • The film has garnered speculation about additional footage being added after Christmas.
  • There are rumors that around 15 to 20 minutes of extra content may be included in the OTT version.
  • Pushpa 2 has set numerous records in Hindi-speaking regions and is highly anticipated by fans.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 has set numerous records, especially in the Hindi-speaking regions.‚Äù

While there are speculations about its runtime extension, no official announcements have been made yet.

item.title: Shalin Bhanot Finds Love Again, Dating Bigg Boss 18's Eisha Singh? Know Here - News18
item.description:
Shalin Bhanot Finds Love Again, Dating Bigg Boss 18's Eisha Singh? Know Here

Date: December 29, 2024

Source: News18

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Eisha Singh addressed speculations about her relationship with Shalin Bhanot after host Salman Khan's probing questions.

  • Salman Khan hinted at Shalin's involvement during a playful exchange with Eisha.
  • Eisha clarified that they are merely good friends and not romantically involved.
  • Shalin was previously married to Dalljiet Kaur, and their divorce was marred by allegations of domestic violence.
  • Dalljiet recently remarried but is now separated again.
  • Despite their troubled past, Eisha values her friendship with Shalin.
‚ÄúShalin is only my best friend... but there‚Äôs nothing more to it,‚Äù Eisha stated.

This clarification comes amidst ongoing media speculation about their relationship post-Bigg Boss.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 24 Early Trends: Becomes First Hindi Film To Cross 750 Crores With 40% Jump On 4th Saturday - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 24 Early Trends: Becomes First Hindi Film To Cross 750 Crores With 40% Jump On 4

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Allu Arjun‚Äôs Pushpa 2 continues to go crazy during the weekend. After enjoying a three-week historic run, the film picked up massively on the fourth Saturday. It once again entered double-digits and achieved another milestone at the Indian box office by crossing the 750 crore milestone, and is on track to be the first 800 crore net grosser.

  • Pushpa 2 (Hindi) achieved earnings of 10.50-11.50 crores on Day 24, a 40-53% increase from Day 23's earnings of 7.50 crores.
  • Total collection at the Indian box office now stands at 758.25-759.25 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 became the first Hindi film to cross the 650 crore, 700 crore, and now 750 crore milestones.
  • The film is expected to cross 770 crores soon as it continues to attract moviegoers.
‚ÄúA particular film will need extraordinary buzz on the ground level, along with mass appealing content‚Äù - Koimoi

In summary, Pushpa 2 is setting unprecedented records in the Hindi film market, showcasing incredible earnings in its fourth weekend.

item.title: Salman Khan cuts four-tier cake with niece Ayat at Jamnagar birthday bash; Mukesh Ambani-Nita Ambani sing for him. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan Celebrated His Special Day with His Close Ones

Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday with family and close friends in Jamnagar, Gujarat, at a lavish party hosted by Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani. The event featured a four-tier cake, singing, and festive fireworks.

  • Salman cut a large cake, assisted by his niece Ayat.
  • Family members and guests included his mother, stepmother, siblings, and notable Bollywood figures.
  • Mukesh and Nita Ambani sang for Salman during the cake-cutting ceremony.
  • Social media was abuzz with birthday wishes for Salman from other celebrities.
  • Salman is set to star in the upcoming film Sikandar, scheduled for Eid 2025 release.
‚ÄúBest birthday wishes from Singham to Chulbul‚Äù - Ajay Devgn

The birthday celebration was a grand affair that showcased the warmth of family and the glamour of Bollywood, marking another year in Salman Khan's illustrious career.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Pisces, Dec 29- Jan 4, 2025 advices investing in real estate - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope for Pisces: Advice on Investing and Relationships (Dec 29 - Jan 4, 2025)

Date: Dec 29, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

This week, Pisces individuals are advised to invest wisely, particularly in real estate and stocks, while also addressing love-related issues with a constructive mindset.

  • Be sensitive to others' preferences and emotions.
  • Avoid discussing past issues in relationships.
  • Your professional commitment may lead to promotions or appraisals.
  • Consider investments in property or stock as a good opportunity.
  • Minor health concerns might arise, but overall health is stable.
‚ÄúYour commitment at work will have a serious and positive impact.‚Äù

This week emphasizes on balancing financial decisions with personal relationships for Pisces individuals.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Aquarius, Dec 29- Jan 4, 2025 predicts a progressive week - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Today, Dec 29, 2024- Jan 4, 2025

Date: Dec 29, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The Aquarius horoscope for the week predicts a time of golden opportunities coupled with attention needed in love life and health management.

  • Utilize every opportunity to prove professional capabilities.
  • Financial stats are promising, though they may fluctuate.
  • Health minor issues like stomach aches and viral fevers are possible.
  • Relationships require more dedication, particularly for new couples.
  • Career prospects include relocation for IT experts and engineers.
  • Opportunities for investments appear, especially for those knowledgeable in the stock market.
"Your financial stats will be good and your health will have minor issues."

In conclusion, this week offers a mix of opportunities and challenges, emphasizing the need for attention to both professional and personal aspects.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh Shocked As Paparazzi Call Her 'Dosa', Baby John Actress Says 'Aur Dosa Mujhe...' | Watch - News18
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Reacts to Paparazzi Calling Her 'Dosa'

Date: December 28, 2024 Source: News18

Keerthy Suresh, a prominent actress known for her work in Tamil and Telugu films, recently experienced a humorous incident involving the paparazzi.

  • Keerthy Suresh made her Bollywood debut in the film 'Baby John', starring alongside Varun Dhawan.
  • During a recent encounter with paparazzi, she was mistakenly called 'Kriti', prompting her to correct them.
  • One paparazzo referred to her as 'Dosa', which is known as a South Indian dish, leading her to respond: "Keerthy dosa nahi, Keerthy Suresh. Aur dosa mujhe pasand hai."
  • Despite 'Baby John' not performing well at the box office, Keerthy's performance received praise.
  • She recently married her long-time partner, Antony, in a traditional South Indian ceremony.
‚ÄúKeerthy Suresh‚Äôs Bollywood debut as Meera is another highlight of the film. Her nuanced dialogue delivery and expressive acting make her a scene-stealer.‚Äù

This light-hearted moment showcases the intersection of celebrity life and public interaction, highlighting the whims of fame.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope 29th December to 4th January, 2025: Virgo, Sagittarius and other signs ‚Äî check astrological prediction - The Indian Express
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope 29th December to 4th January, 2025: Virgo, Sagittarius and other signs ‚Äî check astrological prediction

Published on: December 29, 2025

This week brings opportunities for personal growth and the chance to achieve significant goals, with tailored insights for each zodiac sign.

  • Gemini: Discover hidden business talents but be cautious about the costs of romance.
  • Cancer: Emotional charm will win over conflict with loved ones this week.
  • Leo: Avoid being exploited; embrace your worth.
  • Virgo: Enjoy creative pursuits amidst routine tasks at work.
  • Libra: Time for important decisions regarding your security; seek home improvements.
  • Scorpio: Make personal choices independently; great time for interviews.
  • Sagittarius: Focus on honesty in finances to avoid pitfalls.
  • Capricorn: Face a crossroads in your personal life; embrace change with courage.
  • Aquarius: Avoid getting entangled in gossip or conspiracies this week.
  • Pisces: Teamwork will be essential for success; prioritize companionship in love.

Overall, a week emphasizing personal achievements and social interactions.

item.title: Top 10 Highest-Grossing Indian Films Of 2024.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Top 10 Highest-Grossing Indian Films Of 2024

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The storm of Pushpa 2 has swept audiences off their feet, with its frenzy expected to persist well into the new year. Powered by Allu Arjun‚Äôs electrifying performance, the magnum opus has raked in an astounding ‚Çπ1,631.21 crore gross at the worldwide box office in just 22 days.

  • Pushpa 2 is the highest-grossing Indian film of 2024, projected to surpass ‚Çπ1,700 crore globally.
  • Kalki 2898 AD ranks second, being the first Indian film to cross ‚Çπ1,000 crore this year.
  • Stree 2, a horror-comedy, is positioned third, grossing ‚Çπ884.45 crore.
  • The Greatest Of All Time by Thalapathy Vijay comes in fourth with ‚Çπ464.54 crore.
  • Devara rounds out the top five, totaling ‚Çπ428.39 crore.

Check out the full list of the top 10 highest-grossing Indian films of 2024:

  1. Pushpa 2 ‚Äì 1631.21 crores
  2. Kalki 2898 AD ‚Äì 1054.67 crores
  3. Stree 2 ‚Äì 884.45 crores
  4. The Greatest Of All Time ‚Äì 464.54 crores
  5. Devara ‚Äì 428.39 crores
  6. Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 ‚Äì 421.22 crores
  7. Singham Again ‚Äì 402.26 crores
  8. Fighter ‚Äì 354.70 crores
  9. Amaran ‚Äì 341.52 crores
  10. HanuMan ‚Äì 294.18 crores

item.title: Radhika Merchant Ditches The Gown And Opts For A Pink Nightsuit For Ambani's Jamnagar Christmas Celebration - News18
item.description:
Radhika Merchant Ditches The Gown And Opts For A Pink Nightsuit For Ambani's Jamnagar Christmas Celebration

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: News18

Radhika Merchant was spotted in a cozy pink nightsuit during the Ambani family's Christmas celebration in Jamnagar, marking her first Christmas with the family.

  • The celebration was a casual pajama party theme rather than a formal affair.
  • Guests included celebrities like Janhvi Kapoor, Orry, and Shanaya Kapoor.
  • Radhika's night suit featured a candy cane print and was made of soft satin fabric.
  • The outfit is from Pretty Little Thing and retails for approximately Rs 5,400.
  • She accessorized with quirky earrings and a luxe wristwatch to elevate her look.
  • Radhika married Anant Ambani earlier in July 2024.
‚ÄúRadhika elevated her comfy look with stylish accessories and natural makeup.‚Äù

Overall, Radhika showcased a blend of comfort and style in her casual yet chic outfit for the festive occasion.

item.title: Rasika Dugal opens up about her long-distance relationship with Shah Rukh Khan: 'I‚Äôll abandon my shyness - TOI Etimes
item.description:

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

In a recent interview, Rasika Dugal shares insights about her relationship with Shah Rukh Khan, emphasizing her journey to overcome shyness.

  • Rasika expresses her desire to overcome her shyness in the future.

item.title: Jameela Jamil rips Hollywood amid ‚Äòera of Ozempic heroin chic‚Äô after eating disorder battle - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jameela Jamil rips Hollywood amid ‚Äòera of Ozempic heroin chic‚Äô after eating disorder battle

Publication Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Jameela Jamil, the actress known for her past struggles with anorexia, has openly criticized Hollywood for promoting an unhealthy 'Ozempic heroin chic' culture through her social media. She shared a video asserting her commitment to maintain her mental health despite industry pressures.

  • Jamil's Instagram video features her celebrating body positivity while dancing in a swimsuit.
  • She expresses concern about the body-shaming culture fueled by weight loss drugs like Ozempic.
  • In a reflective throwback, she reveals the struggles faced during her anorexia battle.
  • Jamil suggests that the trend of extreme thinness is harmful and questions its impact on youth.
  • She vows not to conform to damaging beauty standards.
‚ÄúWhat are we teaching the kids?‚Äù ‚Äì Jameela Jamil questioning Hollywood's impact on young audiences.

Jameela Jamil's candid remarks highlight ongoing issues regarding body image and the pressures faced by individuals in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Home Cooked Meals And A Cheat Day: Here's What Shilpa Shetty's Diet Looks Like - News18
item.description:
Shilpa Shetty's Diet: Emphasizing Home Cooked Meals and Cheat Days

Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: News18

Shilpa Shetty, a well-known figure in Bollywood, shares her approach to diet, emphasizing home-cooked meals and an enjoyable, balanced approach to eating.

  • She prefers simple, hearty meals and avoids restrictive diets.
  • Cheat days are included for indulging in favorites like desserts.
  • Breakfast includes aloe vera juice, porridge, and tea with brown sugar.
  • Lunch typically consists of brown rice or chapatti, dal, chicken curry, and vegetables.
  • Dinner includes a light meal of salad, soup, and chicken dish.
  • Maintains fitness through yoga and weight training.
‚ÄúMy day starts with aloe vera juice. It is great for your immune system; it‚Äôs great for your skin.‚Äù - Shilpa Shetty

Shilpa Shetty emphasizes the importance of home-cooked meals while incorporating a healthy lifestyle with her enjoyable eating habits.

item.title: Bombay Velvet‚Äôs Failure Still Haunts Amit Trivedi: 'It Shouldn‚Äôt Have Been This Bad' - News18
item.description:
Bombay Velvet‚Äôs Failure Still Haunts Amit Trivedi: 'It Shouldn‚Äôt Have Been This Bad'

Publication Date: December 28, 2024
Source: News18

Despite grand expectations, the 2015 film Bombay Velvet directed by Anurag Kashyap turned out to be a colossal failure, impacting musician Amit Trivedi deeply as he reflects on his work on the movie.

  • The film, backed by Vikas Bahl and Vikramaditya Motwane, was based on the book Mumbai Fables by Gyan Prakash.
  • Amit Trivedi considered his time working on the film as one of the lowest phases of his career.
  • Trivedi devoted four years to the film‚Äôs music, expecting positive results but faced an unexpected disaster.
  • He aimed to introduce jazz music to Bollywood but was left feeling hopeless after the film's release.
  • He expressed disbelief over how negatively the film was received, stating, it shouldn't have been that bad.
‚ÄúShayad bahut mehnat chali gayi thi ussme... disaster expect nahi karoge‚Äù - Amit Trivedi
‚ÄúToh sab kuch disaster ho gaya, aaye gaye chala bhi nahi...‚Äù - Amit Trivedi

In conclusion, the failure of Bombay Velvet continues to haunt Amit Trivedi as he reflects on the significant amount of passion and effort he invested in the project, ultimately leading to feelings of despair.

item.title: Salman Khan celebrates his 59th birthday with niece Ayat; cuts multi-tiered cake - WATCH video - TOI Etimes
item.description:

Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday with a grand party in Jamnagar, sharing the day with his niece Ayat. The celebration featured extravagant decorations and fireworks.

item.title: Baby John box office collection day 4: Varun Dhawan film fails to gain momentum on Saturday, earns just Rs... - DNA India
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Collection Day 4: Varun Dhawan Film Fails to Gain Momentum

Published on: December 28, 2024  |   Source: DNA India

Baby John, headlined by Varun Dhawan, is struggling at the box office, particularly in its fourth day of release. Despite the film's strong opening, it has failed to maintain momentum amidst stiff competition.

  • The film, released on December 25, garnered Rs 19.65 crore in its first three days in India.
  • On Saturday, it earned only Rs 3.57 crore, bringing its total to Rs 23.22 crore over four days.
  • Critics and audiences have delivered mixed to negative reviews for the film, citing predictability and a lack of originality.
  • Despite notable performances, the film is considered one of the biggest flops of the year.
‚ÄúWhile a few have hailed Varun's performance, majority of the viewers have criticized the film for its predictability.‚Äù

Overall, Baby John is facing significant challenges at the box office, competing against the successful releases of Pushpa 2 and Mufasa.

item.title: Ravi Kishan reveals he lost out on 'Gangs of Wasseypur' as Anurag Kashyap couldn‚Äôt afford his demands: 'I - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ravi Kishan reveals he lost out on 'Gangs of Wasseypur' as Anurag Kashyap couldn‚Äôt afford his demands: 'I used to bathe in milk'

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Source Unknown

Ravi Kishan discusses how he missed the opportunity to star in the film 'Gangs of Wasseypur' due to financial disagreements with director Anurag Kashyap, illustrating his previous high expectations.

  • Kishan revealed he insisted on a considerable pay due to his prior success.
  • He humorously mentioned his extravagant lifestyle at the time, stating, 'I used to bathe in milk.'
  • The exchange highlights the financial constraints often faced by filmmakers.
'I used to bathe in milk.'

This revelation emphasizes the sometimes humorous, yet serious, nature of negotiations in the film industry.

item.title: Varun Dhawan's Baby John shows being replaced by Hindi version of Unni Mukundan's Marco: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan's Baby John Faces Replacement by Marco's Hindi Version

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Varun Dhawan's film Baby John, which premiered on Christmas, is struggling at the box office, while the Malayalam film Marco is garnering positive attention and replacing Baby John's shows.

  • Baby John has not performed well since its release.
  • Marco, starring Unni Mukundan, has been well-received and is set to replace shows of Baby John in North India.
  • Marco has collected ‚Çπ29.9 crore net in India and ‚Çπ57 crore worldwide.
  • Baby John has earned ‚Çπ19.65 crore net in India and ‚Çπ27.60 crore worldwide.
  • The violent nature of Marco has drawn significant curiosity among audiences.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a curiosity to see it (Marco)... it is touted to be one of India‚Äôs most violent films.‚Äù

The replacement of shows indicates a shift in audience preference and highlights the competitive nature of current Bollywood releases.

item.title: Marathi actress Urmila Kothare's car accidentally hits metro workers in Mumbai; one killed - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Marathi actress Urmila Kothare's car accidentally hits metro workers in Mumbai; one killed

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: Times of India

In a tragic incident in Mumbai, a car driven by actress Urmila Kothare accidentally struck metro workers, resulting in the death of one individual. The event has raised concerns about road safety and the welfare of construction workers.

  • The accident occurred while metro construction work was being conducted in the area.
  • One worker was pronounced dead at the scene, leading to an investigation into the circumstances.
  • Kothare expressed her condolences and shock regarding the incident.
  • The Mumbai police are looking into the accident to establish accountability.
‚ÄúI am devastated by this incident and my heart goes out to the family of the deceased.‚Äù - Urmila Kothare

This event has sparked discussions on the safety protocols for workers in construction zones and the obligations of drivers in such scenarios.

item.description:

Allu Arjun led Pushpa 2 continues its rock-solid hold at the Hindi box office. It has entered its fourth week, and the daily collections have gone below the 10 crore mark. The action thriller has achieved yet another milestone in India.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 24: Allu Arjun‚Äôs film stands strong, adds ‚Çπ9.05 crore on Saturday | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 24

Publication Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Live Mint

At the Indian Box Office, Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer collected a total of ‚Çπ1137.9 crore net during 24-day run, according to early estimates provided by film industry tracker Sacnilk at 8:15 pm. On Saturday, the blockbuster smoothly sailed past Friday's collection, amassing ‚Çπ9.05 crore net and will easily cross ‚Çπ10 crore mark by the end of the day.

  1. Pushpa 2 has grossed ‚Çπ1137.9 crore in 24 days.
  2. The film became the first to cross ‚Çπ100 crore in its third week.
  3. It grossed ‚Çπ1719.5 crore worldwide in 22 days.
  4. This includes ‚Çπ1128.85 crore from the domestic market.
  5. The movie features actors like Fahadh Faasil and Dhananjaya.
‚Äú#Pushpa2 sets yet another record: it becomes the first film to cross the ‚Çπ100 cr mark in its third week‚Ä¶ ALL TIME BLOCKBUSTER.‚Äù - Taran Adarsh

Pushpa 2 continues to perform strongly despite numerous competition in the box office. Its record-breaking success marks it as a significant contributor to the Indian film industry.
